CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(SalesOrg__r.SalesOrganizationCode__c ), '', SalesOrg__r.SalesOrganizationCode__c+'_')+ IF(ISBLANK(harvest__r.Code__c ), '', harvest__r.Code__c +'_')+ IF(ISBLANK(TEXT(Currency__c)), '', TEXT(Currency__c)+'_')+ IF(ISBLANK( SalesCondition__r.ExternalId__c ), '', SalesCondition__r.ExternalId__c +'_')+ IF(ISBLANK( ProductGroup__r.ExternalId__c ), '', ProductGroup__r.ExternalId__c +'_')+ IF(ISBLANK( SalesOffice__r.Codigo__c ), '', SalesOffice__r.Codigo__c +'_')+ IF(ISBLANK( Culture__r.Codigo__c ), '', Culture__r.Codigo__c +'_')+ IF(ISPICKVAL(AccountType__c, "" ), '', TEXT(AccountType__c) +'_')+ IF(ISBLANK(Account__r.ExternalId__c ), '', Account__r.ExternalId__c +'_')+ IF(ISBLANK(SalesTeam__r.ExternalId__c ), '', SalesTeam__r.ExternalId__c +'_')+ IF(ISBLANK(Product__r.ProductCode ), '', Product__r.ProductCode)
CustomField.label: Descrição Externald
